name: Scuderia Racing [2021]
description:
The game includes:

A team editor to customize each team's livery, name and driver names

4 different modes:

  •    Singleplayer Race/Qualifying
  •    Singleplayer Season
  •    Splitscreen Racce
  •    Free Practice

20 different racing teams, 40 drivers and 8 race tracks to race in!

Android Game on Google Play - development has stopped -
